channel.title: intelliJ on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in intelliJ on My New Hugo Site

item.title: IntelliJ Tips
item.description: Shortcuts Ctrl+J: To show JavaDoc Cmd+Alt+B: To show interface implementations Alt+Enter: when cursor on class declare line, press Alt+Enter can quickly create a unit test against this test class Ctrl+Shift+A: Action window, just like sublime, search IDE actions F11: add bookmark, Shift+F11: show bookmarks Shift + Escape: close bottom source pannel or left side barGo to settings, Editor->General->Mouse-> change font size (Zoom)
